subject: Assalamu alaikum wa rahmatulla
body:
Assalamu alaikum wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh (May the peace and mercy of Allah be with you)
I hope this Email finds you in good Health. In View of my Correspondence with you, I unassumingly solicit for your utmost consideration, as this letter Serves as my Formal Notice of Intent to go into a multinational investment with you in your country.I'm open minded manner, I purpose contact you to negotiate my preposition for investment of multinational companies and industries with you in your country.Though i don't know you in person and i haven't met you before it will very hard to trust a stranger with such project but am doing this because I don’t have anyone who can help me from my family because I loss my family in Libya civil war and right now am at the Hospital suffering from Lung Cancer disease.
I am very sure, that you are a good person because is only Good person with Good heart can have this great opportunity coming to your way.you are just a lucky person for me to choose you out of millions around the world but i decided to contact you because my mind Choose you and i believe on what came out from my mind is the right thing to do for me that is why i decided to contact you for this is Great Opportunity for my Investment Project which will help your financial status too.
We were building a beachfront hotel and Estate on the island of Malta before my husband died and since my husband died, I have not been able to complete the construction project because I suffer from a lung cancer disease that I can no longer continue with the project due to my health problem and I want you to continue with this project and manage our business abroad I also want you to know that I am sent by God, believe it or not, this project will also help your financial situation and create job opportunities for your people. in your country or foreign country. I want you to help me manage my family's properties in foreign countries, I also want to appoint you as the Executive Director (C.E.O) of our business and properties in foreign countries.
Thank you.
Mrs Zainab A. Abdallah
Ma’a salama

subject: Re: Assalamu alaikum wa rahmatulla
body:
Wa alaikum assalam wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I am sorry to hear about your health struggles and the loss of your family in the civil war. It must be a challenging time for you.

I appreciate you considering me for this investment project and trust that you see potential in our collaboration. Could you please provide more details about the beachfront hotel and estate project in Malta? I would like to understand how I can assist you further and ensure the success of this venture.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Earl
